attributes.action: Scrap Local Councils from bringing in this new Choice Based Lettings program in for there housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop local councils from bringing in this Choice Based Lettings rubbish in as it is not a better way to rent a home of your local council it means if i found a home and there were 150 bids on it there is still 149 people without a house BRING BACK THE POINTS SYSTEM were you were awarded a house on a waiting list there is programs like this in Northeast England i URGE you to stop this before there is a big homeless problem in Briton!!!!!
